title: Hollow
description: A darkly comic and thought-provoking novel about grief, belief, and the collapse of a life built on certainty.
author: Owen Egerton

title: The Adult
description: A tender coming-of-age novel about identity, queerness, and the search for belonging in a world full of contradictions.
author: Bronwyn Fischer

title: Plastic
description: A bold and imaginative dystopian debut exploring identity, technology, and the performance of self in a synthetic world.
author: Scott Guild"

title: Three Novels
description: A beautifully crafted volume gathering three of Yuri Herrera's era-defining novellas—Kingdom Cons, Signs Preceding the End of the World, and The Transmigration of Bodies—exploring themes of power, migration, and mortality through mythic and poetic storytelling.
author: Yuri Herrera
